name: Troll Cat Adventure
description:
Troll Cat Adventure - First April game, a prototype made in less than 24 hours! 

I tried to replicate the aesthetics of the browser games of the 2010s, the game is heavily inspired by - Cat Mario.

This is my first game, play at your own risk, and hint - different blocks may mean something.

Art - Aniroge

Code - Aniroge

Sound/Music - https://freesound.org/
